Hilda Shaeffer

  1. Foster Name: Hilda
  2. Foster Family: George and Kaite Eisenmenger
  3. Location of Family: Humphrey, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 1908-04-26, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1999-09-07, Columbus, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Hilda Adamy
  11. Spouse Name: Leo Adamy
  12. Source: Humphrey Democrat, 22 December 1911; Humphrey Democrat, 10 January 1952; Columbus Telegram, 9 September 1999; 1920 United States Federal Census.
